document

Interface MainTextStatistics

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDocument, Essay, ReadingMaterial

    public interface MainTextStatistics
    Interface to record the methods with output displayed in the main view of the GUI. The interface itself is never called and used to conveniently separate the methods for basic and extended analysis of the text.
    Author:
    Elena Khasanova

      • wordsOfLevel

                                                                   java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> vocab)

        Parameters:
        text - - text to evaluate as a list of words

        Returns:
